{{cpp/title|operator&lt;&lt;{{small|(std::error_code)}}}}
{{cpp/error/error_code/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=system_error|since=c++11|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os, const error_code&amp; ec );
}}

Performs stream output operation on error code {{c|ec}}.

Equivalent to {{c|os &lt;&lt; ec.category().name() &lt;&lt; ':' &lt;&lt; ec.value()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|os|output stream to insert data to}}
{{par|ec|error code}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{tt|os}}
